channel.title: Challenge Collection: Reverse Engineering and CrackMe
channel.description:
# Reverse Engineering and Crackme challenges
This topic is an aggregation of Crackme and reverse engineering challenges developed for 0x00sec. Please discuss the challenges in the thread they were originally posted or on IRC in `#challenges`
This curation is based entirely on my own whim and not a complete aggregation of all RE/Crackme challenges posted on the forum.
## NoREpls by [DTM](https://0x00sec.org/u/dtm/summary)
[[CrackMe] NoREpls - part 0](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-norepls-part-0/2964)
[[CrackMe] NoREpls - part 1](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-norepls-part-1/2974/3)
[[CrackMe] NoREpls - part 2](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-norepls-part-2/2987)
[[CrackMe] NoREpls - part 3](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-norepls-part-3/2994)
[[CrackMe] NoREpls - part 4](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-norepls-part-4/3002)
[[CrackMe] NoREpls - part 5](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-norepls-part-5/3022)
[[CrackMe] NoREpls - part 6](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-norepls-part-6/3059)
## Misc CrackMe and Reversing
[RemoveMe](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-remove-me/2189)
[KeyGenMe](https://0x00sec.org/t/keygenme-easy-cracking-your-first-program/1075) (easy)
[Bit Banging](https://0x00sec.org/t/reverseme-bit-banging/2522) (intermediate)
[The Twisted Road to Despair](https://0x00sec.org/t/keygen-the-twisted-road-to-despair/2727)
[Devil's Swapper](https://0x00sec.org/t/challenge-devils-swapper/2225)
[Brute and Smart](https://0x00sec.org/t/challenge-brute-and-smart/1274)
[Crackme.c](https://0x00sec.org/t/crackme-c-a-small-reversing-puzzle/1762)
[Slightly More Advanced Keygen](https://0x00sec.org/t/keygen-slightly-more-advanced-keygen/1267)
## GBC RE and Forensics Series by [pico](https://0x00sec.org/u/0x00pf)
[Case:GBC-17/124](https://0x00sec.org/t/case-gbc-17-124/2980)
